SELECT uGUID,sProviderFullName,sProviderName FROM HSFabricTrade_HZFE.dbo.pbProvider WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE bUsable=1 AND sProvidertype LIKE '%供应%'

SELECT pb_follow_man,(CASE WHEN ISNULL(NINACQTY,0)=0 THEN NULL ELSE CAST(round(ISNULL(NINACQTY,0),1,1) as REAL) END) AS ninacqty,* FROM order_plan_pb_batch a (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.v_order_pb_plan_material_list b (NOLOCK) ON (b.order_no=a.plan_order_no AND b.sample_material_no=a.plan_material_no AND b.sProviderName=a.provider ) LEFT JOIN order_plan_control c ON a.plan_order_no=c.order_no WHERE (c.pb_follow_man IS NOT NULL and c.pb_follow_man <> '') AND {0}
